data.comment: Today's referee, Guido Winkmann, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of B. Munich.
In the minute 4, B. Munich's Douglas Costa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bremen have a goal kick.
Free kick Bremen.
In the minute 5, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Guido Winkmann signals a B. Munich throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 6, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In Munich, Thomas Muller (B. Munich) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 7, Guido Winkmann awards Bremen a goal kick.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 11, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In the minute 15, In Munich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benjamin Pavard (B. Munich) gets a yellow card.
Bremen push upfield but Guido Winkmann quickly pulls them for offside.
Bremen's Josh Sargent gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Bremen drives forward and Ludwig Augustinsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Hernandez.
In the minute 18, Lucas Hernandez is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Lucas Hernandez (B. Munich) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Leon Goretzka.
In the minute 20, Bremen are caught offside.
Bremen pushes forward through Leonardo Bittencourt, whose finish on goal is saved.
Josh Sargent of Bremen is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 21, B. Munich drive forward but Thomas Muller is judged offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Munich.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Leonardo Bittencourt of Bremen gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Munich.
In the minute 25, Throw-in B. Munich.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Kingsley Coman is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 30, B. Munich's Kingsley Coman looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Jamal Musiala of B. Munich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 32, Leonardo Bittencourt is booked for the away team.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
In the minute 33, Bremen have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
Free kick B. Munich.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 40, Kingsley Coman for B. Munich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guido Winkmann awards Bremen a goal kick.
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ludwig Augustinsson (Bremen) has received a yellow card from Guido Winkmann.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
B. Munich's Douglas Costa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bremen defender.
Throw-in for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 45, Guido Winkmann signals a Bremen throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Maximilian Eggestein scores to make it 0-1 at Allianz Arena.
Great play from Josh Sargent to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Bremen.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich's David Alaba is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 52, Great shot from B. Munich's Douglas Costa but he is denied by the crossbar.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In Munich B. Munich drive forward through Kingsley Coman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 54, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
In the minute 57, B. Munich's Douglas Costa has run offside.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Guido Winkmann awards Bremen a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Guido Winkmann awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In the minute 62, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Kingsley Coman.
Leon Goretzka with an assist there.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of B. Munich.
In the minute 63, B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team have replaced Kingsley Coman with Serge Gnabry. This is the second substitution made today by Hans-Dieter Flick.
The home team replace Douglas Costa with Leroy Sane.
Goal kick for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 64, B. Munich make their fourth substitution with Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting replacing Jamal Musiala.
Guido Winkmann signals a B. Munich throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 66, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Felix Agu is replacing Leonardo Bittencourt for the away team.
Throw-in for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 68, Bremen have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 71, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Arena with Jean-Manuel Mbom replacing Kevin Mohwald.
In the minute 73, Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
B. Munich drive upfield and Benjamin Pavard gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bremen defender.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a B. Munich throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 79, B. Munich are coming forward and Serge Gnabry gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Guido Winkmann awards Bremen a goal kick.
Bremen's Maximilian Eggestein breaks free at Allianz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, B. Munich have a goal kick.
B. Munich surge into the attack at Allianz Arena but Robert Lewandowskiâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Bremen.
Bremen pushes forward through Josh Sargent, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
In the minute 84, In Munich B. Munich attack through Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
In the minute 87, Josh Sargent of Bremen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Munich a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Goal kick for Bremen at Allianz Arena.
Guido Winkmann blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Tahith Chong is on a sub for Milot Rashica for Bremen.
Jiri Pavlenka (Bremen) has received a first yellow card.
